sn22.107:1.2: “Mendicants, there are these five grasping aggregates.
sn22.107:1.4: That is, the grasping aggregates of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
sn22.107:1.5: There are ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly understand these five grasping aggregates’ gratification, drawback, and escape …
sn22.107:1.6: There are ascetics and brahmins who do truly understand …”
